articles.description: The carbon-neutral device can directly produce the gas -- called syngas -- in a sustainable and simple way from carbon dioxide and water, setting a new benchmark in the field of solar fuels.
articles.content: London: Scientists have developed an 'artificial leaf' device that uses sunlight to produce a widely-used gas currently made from fossil fuels, and could be used to create a sustainable liquid fuel a… [+2099 chars]

articles.title: INNOVATION: New lung-inspired design turns water into fuel - ETEnergyworld.com
articles.description: The research, published in the journal Joule, could help existing clean energy technologies run more efficiently
